title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 575.2 - Imposition of tax
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 575.2 - Imposition of tax

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 1402

The real estate transfer tax is imposed on each conveyance
of real property or interest therein, including the conveyance of shares in a
cooperative housing corporation, when the consideration exceeds $500.00. The
rate of tax is $2.00 for each $500.00, or fractional part thereof, of such
consideration or value. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
575.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
